title: Michelle's slow cooker sausage casserole
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '16 sausages', '3 onions, sliced', '150g mushrooms, sliced', '6 good size carrots, sliced', 'frozen garden peas, to taste', '1 Maggi beef stock cube', '3 tablespoons gravy granules', 'black pepper to taste (optional)']
